channel.title: Compeitiveness on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Compeitiveness on Stats On the T

item.title: A Stat for Must-See Matches
item.description: A constant conundrum for tennis fans is deciding which match to watch at any particular time. In this post, I look at how we can quanitfy the ‘must-seeness’ of a match based on it’s overall quality and competitiveness using player ratings.
